item.title: Securing Resources in Azure VMs with Microsoft Entra Private Access in a Hub-and-Spoke Architecture
item.author: Author
item.description: I did a little Microsoft Entra Private Access Test setup. My goal was to test access to some private Resources hosted on Azure Virtual Machines with Microsoft Entra Private Access instead of VPN. Overview The test setup is illustrated below: Preview I have one Virtual Machine (VM) with a Windows File Share that I wish to access from my endpoint and I also want to be able to access this VM via RDP.
